name: Pandum online
minimum_requirements: OS: 7 Processor: AMD Sempron or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: ATI Mobility Radeon HD 4200 or equivalent Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews.review_text: This game is a poor mans Diablo III. Still, i cant recommend it to the average player because you have to buy inventory space, and you only start out with ♥♥♥♥ing 5 slots

I like the Dark Fantasy style Game.  So far it is fun. but sure it needs some stuff like shortcuts. I would like to have more Character Costumes.  Well the game is not for everyone. but it is free 2 play. and Im sick of those people who just give it a negative becaue it is not an AAA title. SHAME ON YOU SRCUBS!!!   keep up the good work.
